THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS 8 O BROAD STREET NEW YORK 4, N. Y.
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
May 18, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: Excess Equipment Project No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
The enclosed list of excess equipment can be utilized by Taiwan Power Company.
We suggest that necessary action be taken to procure these items for TPC's use. 140.112.213.82
For your convenience also enclosed is the pertinent catalogue information.
Very truly yours,
4
THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION Charter land Chas. G. Van Ness, Jr. Assistant Project Manager
